price: Namni hamtuun dhufe (dalage) fuulleen isaanii ibidda keessatti gonbifamtee “sila waan dalagaa turtan malee mindeeffamtuu?” [isaaniin jedhama].
arabic: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waman jāa bil-sayi-ati fakubbat wujūhuhum fī al-nāri hal tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
